products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: High-quality over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and premium sound quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

products.name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
products.description: Comfortable, breathable organic cotton t-shirt. Available in multiple colors. Eco-friendly and sustainably sourced.

products.name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
products.description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free, leak-proof design. 750ml capacity.

products.name: Yoga Mat with Carrying Strap
products.description: Extra thick (6mm) non-slip yoga mat. Made from high-density foam with excellent cushioning. Includes carrying strap for easy transport.

products.name: Portable Power Bank 20000mAh
products.description: High-capacity portable charger with dual USB ports and USB-C. Fast charging support for smartphones, tablets, and other devices.

products.name: LED Desk Lamp with USB Port
products.description: Modern LED desk lamp with adjustable brightness, color temperature control, and built-in USB charging port. Energy-efficient and eye-friendly.

products.name: Running Shoes - Men's
products.description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning and breathable mesh upper. Designed for comfort during long runs.

products.name: Bamboo Cutting Board Set
products.description: Set of 3 bamboo cutting boards in different sizes. Durable, eco-friendly, and naturally antimicrobial. Easy to clean and maintain.

products.name: Smart Watch Fitness Tracker
products.description: Advanced fitness tracker with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, step counter, and smartphone notifications. Water-resistant up to 50m.

products.name: Backpack - Laptop Compatible
products.description: Stylish and functional backpack with padded laptop compartment (fits up to 15.6"), multiple pockets, and water-resistant material.

products.name: Coffee Maker with Timer
products.description: Programmable coffee maker with 12-cup capacity, auto-brew timer, and keep-warm function. Perfect for your morning routine.

products.name: Resistance Bands Set
products.description: Complete set of 5 resistance bands with different resistance levels, door anchor, handles, and carrying bag. Perfect for home workouts.
